name: Suzumiya Haruhi no Gekidou
overview: Suzumiya Haruhi no Gekidō is the third game in the series of novels centering around the girl by the name of Haruhi Suzumiya, based off of comics followed by anime adaptation. The core of the gameplay in this game in the series is dancing. The story consists of typical visual novel dialogues, followed by a three-girl dancing consisting of quick-time events. After each dance, you are given a score based on your performance, and are able to retry it if you are aiming for a higher score than that already earned.
